name: RINGS - The International Research Association of Institutions of Advanced Gender Studies
goal:
a. to promote advanced, critical, transformative, self-reflexive gender and feminist research;
b. to advance excellence in disciplinary/transdisciplinary gender and feminist research
c. to promote transnational research collaboration between member institutions in advanced Gender Studies and related studies;
d. to create virtual and physical meeting places for different generations of gender scholars.
interests: Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, General and Institutional Affairs, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: All EU initiatives, strategies and legislation processes that affect the goals of RINGS.
